sentences.en: Her bitter experience has turned her into a stronger person.
sentences.cn: 痛苦的经历使她变得更坚强了.

sentences.en: Her love for him welled stronger than ever.
sentences.cn: 她对他的爱比以前更强烈了。

sentences.en: However strong you are, there's always someone stronger.
sentences.cn: 强中自有强中手, 能人背后有能人.

sentences.en: I had nothing stronger than orange juice to drink.
Lash the two pieces of wood together to make them stronger.
sentences.cn: 把那两块木头牢系在一起使其更结实.

sentences.en: Stronger animals prey on weaker ones.
Thank you for US.I am not afraid to have HIV.I am not afraid to talk about it.YOU make me stronger, we make each other better.
sentences.cn: 感谢美国，我不再害怕身患艾滋，我不在害怕谈论艾滋，是你让我变得强大，是你我们相互鼓舞支持使得彼此的生活更美好。

sentences.en: The 1985 vintage has a stronger bouquet and slight caramelly flavour.
sentences.cn: 这种1985年酿制的陈年佳酿味道更醇厚，带有一种淡淡的焦糖甜味。

sentences.en: The dollar has been stronger of late.
The front door needs a stronger lock.
The hedge of stones is much stronger than a wood hedge.
sentences.cn: 石头围墙比竹篱笆结实多了.

sentences.en: The higher the tree, the stronger the wind.
The Mark 4 gun is stronger than the old Mark 3.
sentences.cn: 四型炮比旧式三型炮火力更猛.

sentences.en: The stronger man dominates the weaker.
The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentences.cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentences.en: Then you must be stronger than us.
sentences.cn: 那么你一定比我们强壮。

sentences.en: They have a stronger appreciation of the importance of economic incentives.
sentences.cn: 他们对经济激励的重要性有了更深的理解。

sentences.en: This is certainly not desirable, but if it meant a stronger agreement that addressed the seriousness of the problem, it may not be that bad.
sentences.cn: “这肯定是不可取的，但如果它意味着一份解决了问题严重性的更强有力的协议，那也未必是坏事，”他说。

trans.tran_cn: 更强壮的，强的( strong的比较级 )，坚强的，强烈的，强壮的
